title: Texas must move floating border barriers in Rio Grande, U.S. judge says
description: Texas placed the spiked barriers in the river without federal permission as part of Operation Lone Star, a $4 billion effort to block illegal border crossings.

title: British police hunt for prison escapee accused of planting fake bombs
description: British police launched a manhunt Wednesday after Daniel Abed Khalife, accused of planting fake bombs on a military base, staged a rare prison escape.

title: 98-year-old charged for role at Nazi death camp
description: Authorities are charging former Nazi-aligned workers as accessories to murder for their contributions to the regime that killed an estimated 6 million people.

title: Romania finds suspected Russian drone fragments on its territory
description: If confirmed, it would represent “a serious violation of the sovereignty and territory of Romania, a NATO ally,” Romanian President Klaus Iohannis said.

title: In photos, video: Storm Daniel floods buildings and traps cars in Greece
description: Storm Daniel flooded buildings and trapped cars in Thelassy’s Volos and Larissa, and dragged away vehicles in Skiathos.

title: In U.S., most UFO documentation is classified. Not so in other countries.
description: Brazil and much of South America have a more relaxed attitude toward the inexplicable, the public’s right to know and the limits of scientific explanation.

title: Blinken arrives in Ukraine to tout U.S. support amid doubts about offensive
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken’s visit to Ukraine comes as its military counteroffensive faces stiff Russian resistance in the country’s south.

title: Court to rule in landmark migrant case against E.U. border agency Frontex
description: The judgment comes amid growing concern about rights abuses at Europe’s borders.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Ukraine had world’s highest civilian death toll from cluster munitions last year, report says
description: With nearly 300 people killed, Ukraine had the highest death toll from cluster munitions last year, surpassing Syria, the Cluster Munition Coalition said.

title: Pope Francis’s praise of Genghis Khan taps into a medieval fascination
description: The pontiff followed generations of earlier European travelers, who marveled at the might of the Mongols and sought an Eastern Christian savior.

title: Gayle Hunnicutt, Texan actress who thrived in Britain, dies at 80
description: She made headlines for her marriage to British actor David Hemmings. Two decades later, she returned to the U.S. to appear in the primetime soap opera “Dallas.”
